topic.title: Encounter Plan Of Care - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Plan Of Care Activity Encounter template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)
SHALL conform to IHE Encounter Entry template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14)
SHALL conform to IHE Encounter Entry template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14)
SHALL conform to CCD Plan Of Care Activity
SHALL conform to CDA Clinical Statement
SHALL conform to CCD Plan Of Care Activity Encounter template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode, where its data type is ActClass

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 ActEncounterCode)
Developers should take care to check that rational combinations of encounter.code and encounter.moodCode are used , but this profile does not restrict any combination.
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id
